cast.overview: In 1979, a group of college students find a Sumerian Book of the Dead in an old wilderness cabin they've rented for a weekend getaway.
cast.title: The Evil Dead

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.   Hal Delrich, sometimes credited as Richard DeManincor, is an American film actor.

He is perhaps best known for his appearance as Scotty in the horror film The Evil Dead (1981). Delrich (credited as Richard DeManincor) also appeared as Officer Garvey in the comedy film Crimewave (1985).

Description above from the Wikipedia article  Richard DeManincor, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Richard DeManincor
